title: Yellowliner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Target one authorized and one non-authorized player at night and **Yellowline** them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a Yellowlined player is a Sentry, they will be redirected to the other Yellowlined player.
- If a non-Sentry targets a Yellowlined player, they will be redirected to the other Yellowlined player. They will learn that it was due to Yellowliner.
- Yellowlining only lasts for the night that the players get Yellowlined.
- Roleblock and Redirect immune

desc:
Post 2693
*Let's have some regrets. There might be a path.*
